snippet.title: Memoir Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Explore a mythical ancient castle and solve puzzles, filled with myths and lost stories while unfolding the secrets to a civilization of deer horned people.

Reveal the mysteries of a mythical ancient castle as you solve puzzle along the way. Guide a little deer kin as she wakes up at the entrance of a mythical ancient castle without memories.

•6 different themed areas for players to explore and discover the story.
•Grid based puzzle where players push puzzle objects to the goals.
•Puzzle objects can merge to become bigger or eliminate each other to fit the goals requirement.

Game is coming soon to Steam and itch.io!

Follow our updates at
Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/MemoirGame/

Twitter:
https://twitter.com/Memoir_Game

Devblog:
https://memoirgame.wordpress.com/

Email us at
hello.memoirgame@gmail.com
